title: Mastering Prompt Frameworks for Business Efficiency
description: Focuses on teaching business professionals how to effectively use prompt frameworks like RTF and Chain-of-Thought to enhance productivity. Includes practical exercises on crafting precise prompts for various business scenarios. Emphasizes the importance of prompt engineering in achieving accurate and relevant AI outputs.
rationale: Understanding and mastering prompt frameworks can significantly improve the efficiency and effectiveness of AI interactions in business settings.

title: Strategic Model Selection: Reasoning vs Standard
description: Guides participants through the process of selecting the appropriate ChatGPT model for different business needs. Covers the strengths and limitations of reasoning models versus standard models. Provides case studies and interactive sessions to practice model selection in real-world business contexts.
rationale: Choosing the right model is crucial for optimizing AI performance and aligning it with specific business objectives.

title: Personalizing AI: CustomGPTs, Memory, and Projects
description: Explores advanced personalization techniques to tailor ChatGPT for individual business requirements. Includes hands-on workshops on creating CustomGPTs and utilizing memory features for ongoing projects. Discusses the impact of personalization on user experience and business outcomes.
rationale: Personalization enhances the relevance and utility of AI tools, making them more effective for specific business applications.

title: Responsible AI Practices: Handling Hallucinations and Data Privacy
description: Focuses on the ethical and responsible use of AI in business environments. Teaches strategies for identifying and mitigating AI hallucinations and ensuring data privacy. Incorporates discussions on the implications of AI decisions and the importance of transparency.
rationale: Responsible AI practices are essential for maintaining trust and compliance in business operations.

title: Next-Level AI Concepts: RAG and AI Agents
description: Introduces participants to advanced AI concepts like Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) and AI Agents. Provides insights into how these technologies can be leveraged for complex business tasks. Includes interactive sessions to experiment with RAG and AI Agents in simulated business scenarios.
rationale: Familiarity with cutting-edge AI technologies prepares business professionals to innovate and stay competitive in their fields.
